name: Mat, Matt, and Matthew's Ball Tossing Challenge
name_original: Mat, Matt, and Matthew's Ball Tossing Challenge
description:
Mat, Matt, and Matthew's Ball Tossing Challenge

Team: Matthew Siper, Mateo Castro, Matthew Nguyen

Controls:

HOLD ANY BUTTON: WINDUP TOSSER

RELEASE THAT BUTTON: TOSS BALL

HIT TARGETS FOR POINTS AND TO REDEEM BALLS

MAX 5 BALLS

MAXIMIZE POINTS BY HITTING MULTIPLE TARGETS DURING SAME TOSS
